===Etymology===
* {{Lang|{{w|Shapur I|''Shapur''}}|pal=𐭱𐭧𐭯𐭥𐭧𐭥𐭩|fa=شاپور}} was a popular name in Sasanian Iran, being used by three Sasanian monarchs and other notables of the Sasanian era and its later periods.
